Approximately 12 percent of people with BPES do not have an identified FOXL2 gene mutation; the cause of the condition in these people is unknown, and therefore there is no information on whether there may be variation within families for these affected individuals.",GARD,"Blepharophimosis, ptosis, and epicanthus inversus syndrome type 1"
